Articles.Content: Every time i get back from to mun and start re entry kerbal game fps start to drop and land textures vanishing also when i land and select recover game crash! This not possibly happend when wet landing only when i land surface!? I own xbox version!
Hi! The same thing happens to me sometimes. Now I have the habit of saving my game before a re-entry. If the game crashes I reload the game and try it again.
